show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Dr. Eugene Zampieron, ND, AHG, www.drznaturally.com interviews, Elieth Ameni Harris MS, RYT. Ameni is the president of Integrative Wellness LLC, Trumbull CT.
He is a Nationally Registered Yoga Teacher with the Yoga Alliance, and has been practicing yoga for over 30 years.
He is a master instructor who had taught students to become certified yoga instructors.
He has many specialties in natural healing modalities including Ayurveda and the healing powers of Doshic (constitutional) yoga therapy and medical Qi gong to help individual clients transcend stressful life styles, build stronger immune systems, reverse effects of aging, promote longevity and facilitate peace of mind.
He specializes in disease prevention, emotional transformation, guided mantra meditation, high energy Kaphyoga and Neigong Qigong for weight loss; controlled breathing (Pranayama) mental concentration and attention (Dharna and Wuju meditation) for improved sports and work performance.
Contact: eharris05@snet.
net.
